level.heading: Enforcement of housing code regulations.
level.text: The presence of loose or peeling paint in residential premises in violation of the housing code regulations codified in Title 14 of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations which constitutes a lead-based paint hazard under this chapter, shall be enforced by the Mayor according to the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-171 substituted "Enforcement of housing code regulations" for "Conforming amendment" in the section heading as enacted by D.C. Law 18-348.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-348
level.text: For history of Law 18-348, see notes under § 8-231.01.
